page.title: 14TELEGRAPH WOOD HILL FORT
page.content: The hill fort is on Toot Hill . It was said that Queen Boadicia was buried there . The area is now rented by Mrs Rogers from Lord Romsey . There is a bomb crater up there from the second World War where Mrs Rogers house is now . There used to be huts where the army used to stay in the first world war. There are five bomb shelters scattered around the hill fort. The ancient Encampment on Toot Hill was the site of one of the warning beacons at the time of the Spanish Armada. There is a tunnel leading from Mrs Rogers house to a bomb shelter . The hill fort is 84 metres high and about 100 metres across. The hill fort now only looks like an ordinary hill.
